docs.snippet: The New European was conceived as a short-term weekly offering in the wake of Britain’s vote to leave the European Union, but it has been a surprise success....
docs.lead_paragraph: The New European was conceived as a short-term weekly offering in the wake of Britain’s vote to leave the European Union, but it has been a surprise success.
docs.abstract: Archant's The New European, short-term weekly print newspaper targeted at Britons who favored remaining in European Union, is surprisingly profitable hit in Britain; is part of broad experiment known as pop-up publishing, in which paper is only produced as short-term print only project, in effort to keep costs low.

headline.main: Fast Response to ‘Brexit’ News: A Pop-Up Paper Finds Success in Britain
headline.print_headline: Fast Response to Niche News: Pop-Up Paper
